shadow.name: MEDIOCRITY
shadow.description: Fear of standing out, hiding unique expression
shadow.behavioral_signature: Playing small, conforming to blend in
shadow.thought_pattern: I shouldn't draw attention. Better to fit in.

gift.name: STYLE
gift.thought_pattern: My unique expression is my gift. I model authenticity.

siddhi.name: EXQUISITENESS
siddhi.description: Pure creative expression as divine art
siddhi.thought_pattern: I am art itself. Expression flows through me.

inversion_protocols.script: You are not mediocre. You are suppressing your unique expression out of fear. Gate 8 is about modeling through creative uniqueness. When you hide yourself, you rob the world of your contribution. Your job is not to fit inâ€”it's to stand out authentically.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel where your expression is held back in your throat. Hum. Make sound. Release the constriction.

experiment.hypothesis: If I express myself authentically for 7 days, I'll inspire others and feel more alive.
experiment.action: Daily: Share one authentic expression (writing, art, conversation) that feels risky or unique.
